resources.string: \ This game is played just like regular Tic Tac Toe with one difference: to win a tile you have to win a smaller game of Tic Tac Toe inside that tile.\n\ \n\ A tie happens when there are no further moves. In the case of a tie in a small board, that will count as a win for both sides in the larger game.

\ This game is played in 2 phases:
 Phase 1: find the longest word in each grid
 Phase 2: find words in each small grid with the selected letters in phase 1
\n\ Gameplay:
 select the letters in the grid,
 then HOLD on any of the selected letter to check if the word is correct
 Each correct letter give you 1 point.
 Each incorrect letter subtract your point by one.
